comment: I basically play no live service multiplayers (primarily shooters) because they lock so much stuff behind multiple forms of monetization
I'm looking forward to buying Modern Warfare for the campaign
But the multiplayer can suck it ;)
let those who care to spend their money do so then
Kiwi, the problem is that by letting companies get away with so much crap, they've pushed the envelope to a ridiculous degree
Oblivion was ridiculed for its horse armor DLC
For something like $3, you unlocked cosmetic armor (with gameplay altering buffs) for your horse mounts
I don‚Äôt make a habit of concerning myself with stupid
I don't love how publishers are looking to nickel and dime you for anything they can
they pull you down to their level and beat you with experience
I can gaurantee if they could charge you real-world money for every single bullet you fired in a shooter, they would
it'd be a lot more realistic!
Part of the reason I rail against Battle Pass systems is that I don't like how far AAA games are going to squeeze money out of customers
It's no longer about making a profit, it's about milking as much cash as humanly possible
At least indie devs are nice~
